name: Marsha: In the Mysterious Tower
description:
Note: THIS GAME IS GAMEPAD COMPATIBLE!

Forgotten by time, forgotten by its architects yet the Tower remains. Marsha must solve various puzzles to uncover where she is and what befell the Tower in its past.

Game produced by: Pixel Eric and Sundial Shark

Tilesets and Character Design: Pixel Eric

Mechanical Design: Sundial Shark

Level Design: Pixel Eric and Sundial Shark

Writing: Pixel Eric

Music composition: JDSherbert

Plugins by: Yanfly, Galv, MOGHunter, SRD, HIME and BreakerZero.

RPG Maker MV: GotchaGotchaGames/Yoji Ojima

--------------------------------------------------

Made for the Harold Jam 2023: Ascent of the Allies hosted by Human!
